Name: Amnon Muchtar
Notes: Shot by Palestinians while inside his car shortly after arriving in the city, apparently for shopping. Muchtar was evacuated by a Palestinian ambulance team to the hospital in the city and from there by Israeli forces to a checkpoint, where, according to media reports, he was pronounced dead. His car was set on fire after he was evacuated.

Name: Binyamin Achimeir
Notes: Stabbed by a Palestinian while grazing sheep near the outpost. His body was found the next day.

Name: Lidor Levy
Notes: Stabbed by a Palestinian who stabbed and wounded two other Israeli citizens at a shopping mall. The stabber was fatally shot by a police officer.

Name: Yitzhak Zeiger
Notes: Fatally shot along with an Israeli minor by a Palestinian Authority police officer who opened fire at Israelis at a gas station in the settlement. The shooter was fatally shot by a soldier.

Name: Oriah Hartum
Notes: Fatally shot along with another Israeli civilian by a Palestinian Authority police officer who opened fire at Israelis at a gas station in the settlement. The shooter was fatally shot by a soldier.

Name: Matan Elmaliah
Notes: Fatally shot near a-Za’ayem Checkpoint by three armed Palestinians who came out of two cars and opened fire at Israeli passengers. Eight other Israelis were wounded by the gunfire. Two of the shooters were fatally shot by Israeli officers and civilians and the third was wounded and arrested.

Name: Yishai Gartner
Notes: Fatally shot along with an Israeli soldier by an armed Palestinian who opened fire at Israelis in Reem (Masmiya) Junction. The shooter was fatally shot by a soldier. According to media reports, four other Israelis were wounded in the shooting, one critically and another severely.

Name: Edna Bloshtein
Notes: Injured by a car in an incident involving two Palestinians who stole cars, ran over passersby and stabbed them. Eighteen other Israeli civilians were injured in the incident. Died of her wounds shortly after.

Name: Lara Emil Ya'qub Tanus
Notes: Injured by Palestinians’ gunfire while riding in a car on Route 60, near the intersection with Route 465. A Palestinian who was riding in the car in front of her was also killed in the shooting.

Name: Liviya Dickman
Notes: Fatally shot with two other Israeli civilians by two Palestinian brothers, while standing at a bus stop at the entrance to the city. Six other Israeli civilians were injured in the shooting. The shooters, Hamas military wing operatives, were fatally shot by soldiers. Another Israeli civilian was fatally shot by a soldier who mistook him for a Palestinian attacker.

Name: Hannah Ifergan
Notes: Fatally shot with two other Israeli civilians by two Palestinian brothers, while standing at a bus stop at the entrance to the city. Six other Israeli civilians were injured in the shooting. The shooters, Hamas military wing operatives, were fatally shot by soldiers. Another Israeli civilian was fatally shot by a soldier who mistook him for a Palestinian attacker.

Name: Elimelech Wasserman
Notes: Fatally shot with two other Israeli civilians by two Palestinian brothers while standing at a bus stop at the entrance to the city. Six other Israeli civilians were injured in the shooting. The shooters, Hamas military wing operatives, were fatally shot by soldiers. Another Israeli civilian was fatally shot by a soldier who mistook him for a Palestinian attacker.

Name: Batsheva Nagari
Notes: Fatally shot by Palestinians in a drive by shooting while in a car with her 12-year-old daughter. Their driver was seriously injured.

Name: Aviad Nir
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian while in a car wash along with his father, who was also killed. The Palestinian fled.

Name: Shai Silas Nigerker
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian while in a car wash along with his son, who was also killed. The Palestinian fled.

Name: Chen Amir
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian member of the Islamic Jihad military wing, who, during a street check, fired at him and another Tel Aviv municipality security officer, who shot and killed the Palestinian.

Name: Ofer Fairman
Notes: Fatally shot by two Hamas military wing operatives together with three other Israeli civilians, one of them a minor. Four other Israeli civilians were wounded in the incident. One of the operatives was shot dead on-site by an Israeli civilian, and the other was killed a short while later by Special Police Unit officers after a chase.

Name: Nachman Shmuel Mordoff
Notes: Fatally shot by two Hamas military wing operatives together with three other Israeli civilians. Four other Israeli civilians were wounded in the incident. One of the operatives was shot dead on-site by an Israeli civilian, and the other was killed a short while later by Special Police Unit officers after a chase.

Name: Elisha Antman
Notes: Fatally shot by two Hamas military wing operatives together with three other Israeli civilians, one of them a minor. Four other Israeli civilians were wounded in the incident. One of the operatives was shot dead on-site by an Israeli civilian, and the other was killed a short while later by Special Police Unit officers during a chase.

Name: Harel Ma'sud
Notes: Fatally shot by two Hamas military wing operatives together with three other Israeli civilians, one of them a minor. Four other Israeli civilians were wounded in the incident. One of the operatives was shot dead on-site by an Israeli civilian, and the other was killed a short while later by Special Police Unit officers after a chase.

Name: Meir Tamari
Notes: Fatally shot by Palestinians from a passing car while driving by the entrance to the settlement.

Name: Inga Avramyan
Notes: Killed when a rocket struck her building. Seven people were wounded in the rocket strike.

Name: Maya Dee
Notes: Killed with her sister, a minor, when Palestinians fired from a passing car at the car they were in with their mother, who was injured and died of her wounds on 11 April 2023.

Name: Rina Dee
Notes: Killed with her sister when Palestinians fired from a passing car at the car they were in with their mother, who was injured and died of her wounds on 11 April 2023.

Name: Lucy (Leah) Dee
Notes: Wounded when Palestinians fired from a passing car at the car she was in with her daughters, one of them a minor, who were killed instantly.

Name: Or Eshkar
Notes: Wounded by shots fired by a Palestinian while walking down the street. Two other Israeli civilians were injured in the incident. The shooter was shot and killed by Israeli police officers.

Name: Ilan Ganeles
Notes: Shot and killed by Palestinians in a drive-by shooting while riding in a car.

Name: Hillel Yaniv
Notes: Shot and killed by a Palestinian while standing in a traffic jam in a car with his brother, who was also killed.

Name: Yagel Yaniv
Notes: Shot and killed by a Palestinian while standing in a traffic jam in a car with his brother, who was also killed.

Name: Ya'aKov Paley
Notes: Run over and killed by a Palestinian. Another Israeli civilian was killed in the incident and five others were injured, including his younger brother, who died of his wounds on 11 February 2023. The assailant was shot and killed by police officers

Name: Alter לדרמן
Notes: Run over and killed by a Palestinian. Another Israeli civilian was killed in the incident and five others were injured, including a minor who died of his wounds on 11 February 2023. The assailant was shot and killed by police officers.

Name: Asher פלאי
Notes: Severely injured after being run over by a Palestinian. His younger brother and another Israeli civilian were also killed in the incident, and four people were injured. The assailant was shot and killed by police officers.

Name: Natali Mizrahi
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian, along with her husband, while the two were attempting to provide first aid to people whom the same Palestinian shot and wounded earlier. Four more Israeli civilians, including a minor, and a foreign national were killed in the incident, and three Israelis were injured.

Name: Eli Mizrahi
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian, along with his wife, while the two were attempting to provide first aid to people whom the same Palestinian shot and wounded earlier. Four more Israeli civilians, including a minor, and a foreign national were killed in the incident, and three Israelis were injured.

Name: Asher Natan
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian while walking on the street. Five more Israeli civilians and a foreign national were killed in the incident, and three Israelis were injured.

Name: Rafael Ben Eliahu
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian when he got out of his car to help people whom the same Palestinian shot and wounded earlier. Five more Israeli civilians, including a minor, and a foreign national were killed in the incident, and three Israelis were injured.

Name: Ilya Sosansky
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian while riding a motorcycle. Five more Israeli civilians, including a minor, and a foreign national were killed in the incident, and three Israelis were injured.

Name: Shaul Hai
Notes: Fatally shot by a Palestinian while walking on the street. Five more Israeli civilians, including a minor, and a foreign national were killed in the incident, and three Israelis were injured.

Name: Tadasa Tashume Ben Ma'ada
Notes: Critically wounded when an explosive device placed by Palestinians at a bus stop he was waiting at, at the entrance to Jerusalem, exploded. An Israeli teen was killed and 16 other people were wounded in the explosion.

Name: Arye Shechopek
Notes: Critically wounded when an explosive device placed by Palestinians at a bus stop he was waiting at, at the entrance to Jerusalem, exploded. Died of his wounds shortly after. Another 17 people were wounded in the explosion. One of them died of his wounds on 26 November 2022.

Name: Tamir Avihai
Notes: Run over and killed on Route 5 by a Palestinian who stabbed two Israeli civilians to death and wounded three more, two severely and one moderately, at the entrance to the Ariel settlement industrial zone. The assailant was shot dead by soldiers.

Name: Mordechai Ashkenazi
Notes: Stabbed to death at a gas station near the Ariel settlement industrial zone, by a Palestinian who stabbed another Israeli civilian to death, ran over and killed a third and wounded three more, two severely and one moderately. The assailant was shot dead by soldiers.

Name: Michael Ledigin
Notes: Stabbed to death at a gas station near the Ariel settlement industrial zone, by a Palestinian who stabbed another Israeli civilian to death, ran over and killed a third and wounded three more, two severely and one moderately. The assailant was shot dead by soldiers.

Name: Ronen Hananya
Notes: Shot and critically wounded by a Palestinian at the Wadi al-Ghrus checkpoint. Died of his wounds shortly after. Four more settlers were wounded by the gunfire. The shooter was run over by the Kiryat Arba settlement security coordinator and shot by a soldier in civilian clothing. Another Palestinian was lightly wounded by the gunfire.

Name: Shalom Sofer
Notes: Stabbed and wounded by a Palestinian, according to media reports in the abdomen, when shopping in the village.

Name: Shulamit Rachel Ovadia
Notes: Beaten to death with an object by a Palestinian. The body of the Palestinian, who committed suicide, was found hanging the next day.

Name: Oren Ben Yiftah
Notes: Stabbed to death by two Palestinians who attacked and killed two other Israeli civilians with an axe. According to Magen David Adom , four other Israeli civilians were injured in the attack, two severely, one moderately and one sustained minor injuries.

Name: Yonatan Havakuk
Notes: Attacked with an axe by two Palestinians who attacked and killed two other Israeli civilians using an axe and a knife. According to Magen David Adom, four other Israeli civilians were injured in the attack, two severely, one moderately and one sustained minor injuries.

Name: Boaz Gol
Notes: Attacked with an axe by two Palestinians who attacked and killed two other Israeli civilians using an axe and a knife. According to Magen David Adom, four other Israeli civilians were injured in the attack, two severely, one moderately and one sustained minor injuries.

Name: Vyacheslav Golov
Notes: Settlement security guard. Fatally shot by two Palestinians while at a guard post at the entrance to the settlement.

Name: Tomer Morad
Notes: Fatally shot along with another Israeli civilian by a Palestinian at a pub in the city. According to media reports, 10 other Israeli civilians were wounded by the shooting: four sustained minor injuries, two moderate injuries and four severe injuries, including one who died of his wounds the following day. The perpetrator was shot dead by Special Police Unit officers and ISA agents the following day in Jaffa.

Name: Barak Lufan
Notes: Severely wounded by the gunfire of a Palestinian, who fatally shot two other Israeli civilians and wounded nine other Israeli civilians. According to media reports, four sustained minor injuries, two moderate injuries and three severe injuries. The perpetrator was shot dead by Special Police Unit officers and ISA agents the following day in Jaffa.

Name: Eitam Magini
Notes: Fatally shot along with another Israeli civilian by a Palestinian at a pub in the city. According to media reports, 10 other Israeli civilians were wounded by the shooting: four sustained minor injuries, two moderate injuries and four severe injuries, including one who died of his wounds the following day. The perpetrator was shot dead by Special Police Unit officers and ISA agents the following day in Jaffa.

Name: Avishai Yehezkel
Notes: Shot by a Palestinian who also shot and killed an Israeli police officer, another Israeli civilian and two Ukrainian citizens. The assailant was fatally shot by a police officer.

Name: Ya'aKov Shalom
Notes: Shot by a Palestinian who also shot and killed an Israeli police officer, another Israeli civilian and two Ukrainian citizens. The assailant was fatally shot by a police officer.

Name: Yehuda Dimentman
Notes: Critically wounded by Palestinians’ gunfire towards the car he was traveling in. According to the military, the shooters ambushed the car. Succumbed to his wounds a short while later.

Name: Eliahu Kay
Notes: Fatally wounded by a Palestinian's gunfire near Bab a-Silsila (the Chain Gate), one of the entrances to the al-Aqsa compound, and died of his wounds a short while later. According to media reports, two other Israeli civilians were wounded by the gunfire – one critically and one lightly, as well as two Border Police officers who were lightly injured by shrapnel. The shooter was shot dead by Israel Police and Border Police officers.

Name: Gershon Franko
Notes: Critically wounded by shrapnel from a rocket that struck his apartment building. Succumbed to his wounds a short while later.

Name: Ido Avigal
Notes: Wounded by shrapnel from a rocket that hit a nearby building. His mother was severely wounded by rocket shrapnel. Succumbed to his wounds later that day.

Name: Khalil 'Awad
Notes: Killed with his daughter, a minor, by a rocket that struck their home in the unrecognized village of Dahmash.

Name: Nadin Khalil 'Awad
Notes: Killed with her father by a rocket that struck their home in the unrecognized village of Dahmash.

Name: Nella Gurevitz
Notes: Killed by a rocket that struck her apartment building. Her husband was injured in the incident.

Name: Leah Yom Tov
Notes: Killed by a rocket that landed near her home while she was standing at the entrance to it.

Name: Yehuda Guetta
Notes: Critically wounded in the head by shots fired from a passing car as he was walking towards a hitchhiking station at Za’atrah (Tapuah) Junction. Another Israeli civilian was severely wounded by the shooting.

Name: Esther Horgen
Notes: Killed by a Palestinian who hit her in the head with a rock in a forest near her home.

Name: Shai Ohayon
Notes: Stabbed and fatally wounded by a Palestinian in Petah Tikva. Succumbed to his wounds a short while later.

Name: Rina Shnerb
Notes: Seriously injured by an IED at a spring near Deir Ibzi’. Died of her wounds shortly after. Her father and brother were also wounded in the explosion. According to media reports, they sustained moderate and severe injuries.

Name: Pinhas Menahem Prezuazman
Notes: Critically injured by rocket shrapnel in a building’s lobby, when a rocket hit the building.

Name: Moshe Feder
Notes: Critically injured by shrapnel in the thigh when a missile hit his car. Succumbed to his wounds shortly after.

Name: Moshe Agadi
Notes: Critically injured by rocket shrapnel near his mother-in-law’s home. Succumbed to his wounds shortly after.

Name: Ziad al-Hamamdah
Notes: Critically injured by rocket shrapnel at the entrance to a factory in the city. Two other people were wounded; according to media reports, one was seriously wounded and the other moderately. Succumbed to his wounds shortly after.

Name: Achiad Ettinger
Notes: Critically wounded by shots fired by a Palestinian. He was shot after the Palestinian stabbed a soldier who had been guarding the intersection by the settlement of Ariel, seized his weapon and used it to fire at the soldier, at Ettinger’s car and at other Israeli cars. The assailant then drove to the Gitai-Avisar junction where he fired at a bus stop, seriously wounding another soldier. The assailant was killed by the Special Police Unit on 19 March 2019 at the village of ‘Ebwein, Ramallah District.

Name: Ori Ansbacher
Notes: Assaulted and stabbed to death by a Palestinian in the woods near Gilo.

Name: Tamar Kaduri
Notes: Stabbed to death along with her husband by a Palestinian who entered their home.

Name: Yehuda Kaduri
Notes: Stabbed to death along with his wife by a Palestinian who entered their home.

Name: Amiad Yisrael Ish-Ran
Notes: Died three days after being delivered by C-section after his 7-months pregnant mother was injured in a drive-by shooting at a hitchhiking station near the settlement of Ofra on Route 60. Six other people were injured in the attack: his father and another person sustained moderate injuries, and four others sustained mild injuries. One of the suspected shooters was killed by a police officer of Israel’s Special Police Unit (a.k.a. Counter Terrorism Unit) on 12 December 2018.

Name: Nina Ginisdanova
Notes: Seriously wounded when a rocket fired by Palestinians hit her apartment building. According to media reports, she never regained consciousness. In the same incident, a Palestinian man who resided in the building while in Israel for work was killed and, according to media reports, another woman was seriously wounded.

Name: Kim Levengrond-Yehezkel
Notes: Fatally wounded by shots fired by a Palestinian employee at the factory where she worked at the Barkan industrial area. According to the media, the shooter instructed another employee to handcuff her and then shot her, Ziv Hajbi and another female employee and fled the scene. Levengrond-Yehezkel and Hajbi were fatally wounded and succumbed to their wounds shortly after. According to the media, the other employee sustained moderate injuries. The shooter was shot dead by Special Police Unit officers on 13 December 2018 at ‘Askar Refugee Camp.

Name: Ziv Hajbi
Notes: Fatally wounded by shots fired by a Palestinian employee at the factory where he worked at the Barkan industrial area. According to the media, the shooter instructed another employee to handcuff a female employee, Kim Levengrond-Yehezkel, and then shot her, Hajbi and another female employee and fled the scene. Hajbi and Levengrond-Yehezkel were fatally wounded and succumbed to their wounds shortly after. According to the media, the other employee sustained moderate injuries. The shooter was shot dead by Special Police Unit officers on 13 December 2018 at ‘Askar Refugee Camp.

Name: Ari Fuld
Notes: Critically injured when a Palestinian stabbed him at the entrance to the Harim shopping mall at the Gush Etzion Junction. Video footage aired on the media shows Fuld and two other Israeli civilians firing at the assailant. According to media reports, the assailant sustained moderate injuries from the gunfire and was taken to hospital. Fuld died of his wounds later that day.

Name: Yotam Ovadia
Notes: Stabbed and fatally wounded by a Palestinian who entered the settlement and also stabbed and injured two other Israeli civilians. According to media reports the two other individuals sustained moderate and mild injuries. The assailant was shot dead by one of them. Ovadia succumbed to his wounds later that day.

Name: Raziel Shevach
Notes: Seriously wounded in a drive-by shooting by Palestinians while he was driving along Route 60, near the settlement outpost of Havat Gilad. Died of his injuries shortly after.

Name: Reuven Shmerling
Notes: Stabbed and bludgeoned to death with a pick-axe by two Palestinians in the Kafr Qasem Industrial Zone.

Name: Or Arish
Notes: Settlement security guard. Shot dead by a Palestinian, along with another settlement security guard and a Border Police officer, as they were screening laborers at the entrance to the settlement of Har Adar. The shooter was shot dead by Border Police officers and the settlement security coordinator, who, according to the police, was moderately to seriously hurt in the incident.

Name: Yusef 'Issam 'Othman
Notes: Settlement security guard. Shot dead by a Palestinian, along with another settlement security guard and a Border Police officer, as they were screening laborers at the entrance to the settlement of Har Adar. The shooter was shot dead by Border Police officers and the settlement security coordinator, who, according to the police, was moderately to seriously hurt in the incident.

Name: Yusef Salomon
Notes: Stabbed to death along with a son and daughter by a Palestinian who had entered the family home in the settlement of Halamish. According to media reports, his wife sustained moderate to serious stab-wounds.

Name: Chaya Salomon
Notes: Stabbed to death along with her father and a brother by a Palestinian who had entered the family home in the settlement of Halamish. According to media reports, her mother sustained moderate to serious stab-wounds.

Name: Ela'd Salomon
Notes: Stabbed to death along with his father and a sister by a Palestinian who had entered the family home in the settlement of Halamish. According to media reports, his mother sustained moderate to serious stab-wounds.

Name: Michal Halimi
Notes: Strangled to death and beat on the head by her Palestinian partner while pregnant.

Name: Levana Malichi
Notes: Critically injured by gunshots fired by a Palestinian at the Ammunition Hill light rail station in East Jerusalem. She died of her wounds later that day. The Palestinian’s gunfire also killed an Israeli police officer and, according to media reports, injured six other people. The shooter was shot dead by Border Police.

Name: Michael Mark
Notes: Shot and killed by Palestinians when he was driving in his car with his family. According to media reports, it was a drive-by shooting. His wife sustained serious injuries, and two of his children sustained moderate and mild injuries.

Name: Hallel Yaffa Ariel
Notes: Critically wounded when a Palestinian teenager came into her house and bedroom and stabbed her repeatedly as she lay in bed. The assailant was shot and killed by members of Kiryat Arba’s security detail.

Name: Michael Feige
Notes: Shot and killed along with two other Israeli civilians during an attack in Tel Aviv. Another woman, also an Israeli civilian, died of heart failure during the attack.

Name: Mila Mishayev
Notes: Shot and killed along with two other Israeli civilians during an attack in Tel Aviv. Another woman, also an Israeli civilian, died of heart failure during the attack.

Name: Edo Ben Ari
Notes: Shot and killed along with two other Israeli civilians during an attack in Tel Aviv. Another woman, also an Israeli civilian, died of heart failure during the attack.

Name: Shlomit Krigman
Notes: Stabbed and critically wounded. The two assailants were shot dead by the settlement security guard. Another Israeli civilian woman was also injured at the time. Shot dead by the settlement guard after stabbing, together with another Palestinian, two women, Israeli civilians. The other assailant was also shot dead. One of the injured women died of her wounds the next day. According to media reports, the other woman sustained moderate injuries.

Name: Dafna Meir
Notes: Stabbed dead at the entrance to her home.

Name: Reuven Birmajer
Notes: Stabbed to death near Jaffa Gate. The two assailants were shot dead by Border Police officers, whose gunfire also hit and killed an Israeli civilian. Media reports stated that another Israeli civilian was stabbed and gravely wounded in the incident.

Name: Gennady Kaufman
Notes: Stabbed and critically wounded near the Tomb of the Patriarchs. The assailant was shot dead by Border Police.

Name: Hadar Buchris
Notes: Stabbed to death at Gush Etzion Junction. The assailant was shot dead by a soldier.

Name: Reuven Aviram
Notes: Stabbed to death along with another Israeli civilian.

Name: Aharon Yesayev
Notes: Stabbed to death along with another Israeli civilian.

Name: Ya'aKov Don
Notes: Shot dead by a Palestinian civilian who opened fire at Israeli vehicles. A Palestinian civilian and a foreign national were also killed by the gunfire. The shooter was shot and injured by security forces and taken into custody.

Name: Natanel Litman
Notes: Killed with his father by shots fired at the car in which his family was traveling.

Name: Ya'aKov Litman
Notes: Killed with his son by shots fired at the car in which his family was traveling.

Name: Avraham Hasno
Notes: Killed when he was run over by a Palestinian truck driver after getting out of his car and attacking Palestinian vehicles with a club, after Palestinians had thrown stones at his car.

Name: Yeshayahu Krishevsky
Notes: Stabbed to death by a Palestinian, right after the latter ran over people waiting at a bus station. The assailant was shot dead by passersby. Media reports stated that three Israelis were also injured in the assault, two sustaining moderate wounds.

Name: Alon Govberg
Notes: Killed by two Palestinians who stabbed and fired at passengers on a bus. Another Israeli was killed during the attack, and a third succumbed to injuries on 27 October 2015. One of the assailants was killed by police gunfire.

Name: Richard Lakin
Notes: Mortally wounded by two Palestinians who stabbed and fired at passengers on a bus. Two other Israelis were killed in the attack. One of the assailants was killed by police gunfire.

Name: Haviv Haim
Notes: Killed by two Palestinians who stabbed and fired at passengers on a bus. Another Israeli was killed during the attack, and a third succumbed to injuries on 27 October 2015. One of the assailants was killed by police gunfire.

Name: Nehemia Lavi
Notes: Stabbed to death when he came to the aid of a family attacked on its way to the Western Wall. The father of the family was also killed in the incident. The assailant was shot dead by police.

Name: Eitam Henkin
Notes: Killed with his wife in a drive-by shooting.

Name: Na'ama Henkin
Notes: Killed with her husband in a drive-by shooting.

Name: Alexander Levlovich
Notes: Killed after a stone a Palestinian threw at his car went into the car, causing him to lose control of the car, which hit an electric pole and a tree. Levlovich sustained injuries to the chest and heart. A female passenger in the car was injured.

Name: Malachi Rosenfeld
Notes: Shot and mortally wounded on Alon Road in drive-by shooting. Died of his injuries the next day.

Name: Danny Gonen
Notes: Shot and mortally wounded by Palestinian gunfire. Died of his injuries in hospital.

Name: Shalom Yohai Sherki
Notes: Critically injured in a ramming attack carried out by a Palestinian at the French Hill junction. Died of his injuries on 16 April 2015. An Israeli woman was also injured in the attack.

Name: Kalman Ze'ev Levine
Notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

Name: Moshe Twersky
Notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

Name: Arye Kupinsky
Notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

Name: Avraham Shmuel Goldberg
Notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

Name: Haim Yehiel Rotman
Notes: Fatally wounded by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Four other worshipers were killed in the incident. In exchanges of fire during the incident a police officer was killed by gunfire whose source is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

Name: Dalia Lemkus
Notes: Stabbed to death by a Palestinian. He had first used his car to hit her and other people waiting at a bus station at the junction at the entrance to Alon Shvut, Bethlehem District.

Name: Shalom Aharon Ba'adani
Notes: Injured in a car attack at the Sheikh Jarah light rail station. Died of his wounds on 7 November 2014. Another Border Police officer killed in the attack. The driver who perpetrated the attack was shot to death when, wielding a metal rod, he assaulted police cars.

Name: Chaya Zissel Braun
Notes: Killed in a car attack at the light rail station at Ammunition Hill, Jerusalem. Another woman who was injured in the attack died of her injuries on 26 October 2014. The driver who perpetrated the attack was shot after he fled his car and died of his injuries later that day.

Name: Karen Jemima Musquera
Notes: Injured in a car attack at the light rail station at Ammunition Hill, Jerusalem. Died of her injuries on 26 October 2014. A 3-month old baby girl was also killed in the attack. The driver who perpetrated the attack was shot after he fled his car and died of his injuries later that day.

Name: Ze'ev Etzion
Notes: Killed by a mortar shell in Kibbutz Nirim. He was chief security coordinator for the kibbutz. The mortar shell also killed the deputy-security coordinator.

Name: Shahar Melamed
Notes: Killed by a mortar shell in Kibbutz Nirim. He was deputy-security coordinator for the kibbutz. The mortar shell also killed the chief security coordinator.

Name: Daniel Tragerman
Notes: Killed by shrapnel from a mortar shell that landed near his home.

Name: Avraham Walles
Notes: Fatally run over in Shmuel HaNavi neighborhood, Jerusalem, by a Palestinian tractor driver, who subsequently caused a bus to overturn and was then shot to death by police.

Name: 'Odeh Lafy Hamdan al-Wadj
Notes: Killed when a rocket hit his home in the village of Wadi Jraba, a community not officially recognized by authorities. Israel did not install protective shelters against rockets there nor was Wadi Jabri placed under the protection of the Iron Dome air defense and interception system. His daughter was severely wounded by the rocket.

Name: Dror Hanin
Notes: Killed by a mortar shell near Erez Checkpoint. According to media reports, he had gone there to bring sweets to the soldiers stationed on the border with Gaza.

Name: Naftali Frenkel
Notes: Shot to death after he was abducted at Alon Shvut junction. His body was found on 30 June 2014. Two other yeshiva students were abducted and killed with him.

Name: Eyal Yifrach
Notes: Shot to death after he was abducted at Alon Shvut junction. His body was found on 30 June 2014. Two other yeshiva students were abducted and killed with him.

Name: Gil-Ad Shaar
Notes: Shot to death after he was abducted at Alon Shvut junction. His body was found on 30 June 2014. Two other yeshiva students were abducted and killed with him.

Name: Salah Shukri Abu Ltayef
Notes: Shot at while repairing the Gaza perimeter fence. The Popular Resistance Committees claimed responsibility for the shooting.

Name: Sraya Ofer
Notes: Attacked with axes and iron rods in his yard, at the village resort where he lived.

Name: Evyatar Borovsky
Notes: Stabbed to death at a hitchhiking station at Tapuah Junction.

Name: 'Alian Salem Alanbari
